data.marketing-about-title: About andCards - Who We Are and What We Doo | andCards
data.marketing-about-description: Хто розробляє сервіси andCards? Дізнайтесь про Cards Corp. — компанію-розробника ПЗ та хмарного сервісу для організації коворкінгів та організацій.

data.marketing-about-we-are-cards: andCards is how people work anywhere
data.marketing-about-what-we-do-marketplace-d: A global marketplace for discovering coworking spaces.
data.marketing-about-us-text: At andCards we believe that there is a better way to do work. Spending years working in the same office with the same people may be boring. We are extremely passionate about this and our goal is to help people achieve it. The is an unlimited amount of amazing places and people around the world and we want to help people take advantage and experience this.
